channel.title: ▬~Project MiamiScape~▬
channel.description:
Welcome to project MiamiScape! We would first like to start out with:[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2e6eoo9.gif[/img]
Ok, So now...
Project MiamiScape will include PK area, and a trading area. This server will somewhat be more like runescape itself. We hope to intergrate our website and server. Which means we will be looking for someone to code a server which comes with MySQL. We will have access to a CentOS server. We will now post positions below:
[b]Positions[/b]
[ul][li]Graphics (1)[/li] [li]Server Coders(2)[/li] [li]Website Coders (1)[/li] [li]MySQL coder (1-2)[/li][/ul]
Now... We will be looking for these positions to be filled. Once we start I will update this post with further information. We plan to release server info a couple months after coding starts. But if we get good coders, then it could be done soon. Please use the following format to signup:
Coder Server/Website/MySQL: Name: Years Of Experience: Languages Known: Can you be active on forums/server: Have you read FULL post: Age: Will you do stuff I tell you not to do:
Graphics: Name: Years Of Experience: Examples: Can you be active on forums/server: Have you read FULL post: Age: Will you do stuff I tell you not to do:
I hope everyone has had a nice time. I hope to see you guys on our server once it comes out.

item.title: ▬~Project MiamiScape~▬
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

Welcome to project MiamiScape!
We would first like to start out with:

Ok,
So now…

Project MiamiScape will include PK area, and a trading area. This server will somewhat be more like runescape itself. We hope to intergrate our website and server. Which means we will be looking for someone to code a server which comes with MySQL. We will have access to a CentOS server. We will now post positions below:

Positions

[ul][li]Graphics (1)[/li]
[li]Server Coders(2)[/li]
[li]Website Coders (1)[/li]
[li]MySQL coder (1-2)[/li][/ul]

Now… We will be looking for these positions to be filled. Once we start I will update this post with further information.
We plan to release server info a couple months after coding starts. But if we get good coders, then it could be done soon.
Please use the following format to signup:

Coder Server/Website/MySQL:
Name:
Years Of Experience:
Languages Known:
Can you be active on forums/server:
Have you read FULL post:
Age:
Will you do stuff I tell you not to do:

Graphics:
Name:
Years Of Experience:
Examples:
Can you be active on forums/server:
Have you read FULL post:
Age:
Will you do stuff I tell you not to do:

I hope everyone has had a nice time. I hope to see you guys on our server once it comes out.
